channel.title: Hacker News - English
channel.description: Hacker News articles summarized and translated to English

item.title: Mind-boggling' poker fraud used X-ray tables, high-tech glasses and NBA players
item.description:
They were "fishes" allegedly being targeted by the mafia in an elaborate poker gambling scheme that included X-ray card tables, secret cameras, analysers in chip trays and sunglasses and contact lenses that could read their hand. Former professional athletes, described by prosecutors as "face cards", were enlisted to help in the scheme and entice victims into playing. That person would then secretly signal to others, prosecutors allege, effectively stealing money and making it impossible for victims to win.

Read more

item.title: Twake Drive ‚Äì An open-source alternative to Google Drive
item.description:
Twake Drive The open-source alternative to Google Drive. com/linagora/twake-drive Run it with Docker cd tdrive docker compose -f docker-compose. x) MongoDB Yarn (recommended) Setup Launch MongoDB using docker run -p 27017:27017 -d mongo Launch frontend with cd tdrive/frontend/; yarn dev:start Launch backend with cd tdrive/backend/node/; SEARCH_DRIVER=mongodb DB_DRIVER=mongodb PUBSUB_TYPE=local \ DB_MONGO_URI=mongodb://localhost:27017 STORAGE_LOCAL_PATH=/[full-path-to-store-documents]/documents \ NODE_ENV=development yarn dev If you need more parameters, create/edit tdrive/backend/node/config/development.

Read more

item.title: Mesh2Motion ‚Äì Open-source web application to animate 3D models
item.description:
Bring Your 3D Models to Life Mesh2Motion is a FREE & open-source web application to animate your 3D models. Try it out ü•≥ Human & Animal rigs Supports importing GLB, GLTF, and FBX models Human and animal skeleton options Intuitive skeleton positioning Undo/Redo system when you make mistakes ‚úîÔ∏è Export Animations Export multiple animations at once Uses widely-supported GLB format Human animation library from Quaternius Video Walkthrough FREE & Open-Source Mesh2Motion is an open-source project. com/scottpetrovic/mesh2motion-app @scottpetrovic @scottpetrovic.

Read more

item.title: A sharded DuckDB on 63 nodes runs 1T row aggregation challenge in 5 sec
Show HN: I built an 8-bit CPU simulator in Python from scratch
item.description:
Installation Tiny8 supports Python 3. From PyPI (stable) uv add tiny8 Examples Bubble sort This example demonstrates a simple bubble sort algorithm implemented in assembly language for the Tiny8 CPU. asm: ; Bubble sort using RAM (addresses 100.

item.title: Typst 0.14: Now Accessible
item.description:
14: Now accessible Typst 0. Typst now generates accessible documents by default, with opt-in support for stricter checks. Unlike many other tools, PDF files created with Typst 0.

item.title: Interstellar Mission to a Black Hole
item.description:
That means many possible targets. Most black holes, though, are thought to be isolated. The latter assumes a rotating black hole, whereas other solutions, like that of Schwarzschild, describe a non-rotating black hole.

Read more
